notes_translated.en: This Excel workbook contains results from the BC Public Service Work Environment Survey dating back to 2013. The survey is administered biennially (every 2 years) to all active employees in the BC Public Service that are under the Public Service Act. All closed-ended survey questions are included in the table, and are shown for each ministry of the BC Public Service. Results are presented as both average scores and percentages, where average scores are calculated using the entire distribution of responses and are represented as scores out of 100. Overall driver scores are average calculations based on the Employee Engagement Model questions and are included in a summary table. Percentages provide more detail on the distribution of response, representing the proportion of employees who agree, disagree, or answer neutral on the questions. For more information about the WES, including survey administration, the statistical model, the history of the program, or other related employee research, please visit the WES section on the BC Stats website (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/statistics/government/employee-research/wes).
